description:

description:

description:
Eleven years of work experience; nine of those leading globally distributed teams in the Financial sector mostly and one-year leading strategy for AI/ML initiatives for the organization.

I have strengthened my skills throughout each project. I focus to add value to our team by ensuring strategy with project objectives that empower our team to deliver their best outcomes in every interaction. Also to keep under control all project administrative matters, communication strategy with clients (internal and external).

In the last 2 years, I've been working in a fully Agile environment where I have had the opportunity to manage large regional projects from financial institutions, Fortune 500 companies in real estate and technology sectors, sports, social impact among others.

Since Sept 2020, I have co-led the AI/ML Business Unit, taking ownership of the initiative as a whole to push towards our organizational objectives to become a leader in the market, using people power and technical knowledge to drive digital strategy and innovation changes to our clients and our community.
headline: Senior IT Project Manager | AI/ML Strategist
